TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Minimize Data Disclosure via Opt-out Consent

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Minimize Data Use via Opt-in consent

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Minimize Data Use via Opt-out consent
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: Enables users to deny usage of their data via opt-out consent

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Minimize Data Collection via Opt-in consent

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Minimize Data Collection via Opt-out consent
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: Enables users to deny collection of their data via opt-out consent

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Minimize Data Retention via Opt-out consent
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: Enables users to deny retention of their data via opt-out consent

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Minimize Data Retention via Opt-in consent
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: Enables users to allow retention of their data via opt-in consent

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Minimize Data Collection via Specified Purpose

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Minimize Data Use via Specified Purpose
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: Specifies the uses of collected user data

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Minimize Data Disclosure via Specified Purpose
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: Specifies the purposes of sharing user data

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Minimize Data Retention via Specified Purpose
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: Specifies the purposes for retaining user data

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Minimize Data Aggregation and Linkages Between Transactions
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: Minimizes data aggregation and linkages across collected data
